name: nextcloud-tasks
description: Nextcloud Tasks is a to-do and task-tracking app that syncs with CalDAV and supports subtasks, due dates, and lists. It works across devices within the Nextcloud ecosystem.
features: Task management: Create, organize, and track to-do items with descriptions and notes.
CalDAV sync: Synchronize tasks across devices using standard CalDAV protocol.
Due dates: Set deadlines for tasks with reminders and overdue notifications.
Subtasks: Break down complex tasks into smaller, manageable subtasks.
Priority levels: Mark tasks with priority indicators for importance ranking.
List organization: Group tasks into multiple lists for projects or categories.
Progress tracking: Mark tasks as complete and track completion percentage for subtasks.
Mobile apps: Access and manage tasks from iOS and Android devices.
Calendar integration: View task due dates alongside events in Nextcloud Calendar.
Sharing: Collaborate on task lists by sharing with other Nextcloud users.
Nextcloud integration: Unified interface and authentication within Nextcloud ecosystem.
Offline support: Edit tasks without internet connection with automatic sync when online.
